title: Software Engineer
description: Built real-time background job processing system using WebSocket-based JobManager with polling fallbacks, enabling non-blocking document downloads that persist across page navigation and user sessions. Delivered 4 major Document Hub features including TFN Declaration and T4 form integrations with database synchronization, centralized permission controls, and comprehensive BDD test infrastructure. Implemented secure OAuth grant revocation endpoints with ownership validation, company scope checks, and soft-delete persistence. Engineered Legal Hold functionality with document lock/unlock capabilities, API services, and observer pattern for dynamic tab switching.
shortDescription: Building real-time job processing systems and major Document Hub features with comprehensive testing infrastructure.
highlights: OAuth grant revocation with ownership validation
Legal Hold functionality with observer pattern

title: Vice President
description: Led executive board operations and strategic planning for one of Northeastern's cultural organizations. Managed event planning, member relations, and organizational growth initiatives.
shortDescription: Led executive board operations and strategic planning for cultural organization.

title: Software Engineer
description: Enhanced user onboarding and adoption of internal AI tools through developing an in-app interactive product tour system using React-joyride. Refactored database models to support user metadata, ensuring scalability and seamless integration with new API endpoints. Deployed a Generative AI Assistant using Azure AI, reducing knowledge retrieval time and improving user support. Redesigned and launched a SharePoint innovation platform with documentation viewed 25,000+ times.
shortDescription: Built interactive product tours and deployed Generative AI Assistant using Azure AI.

title: Program Coordinator
description: Coordinated cultural programming and events for the student organization. Developed public speaking skills through event hosting and community engagement.
shortDescription: Coordinated cultural programming and community events.

title: Cashier / Barista
description: Provided excellent customer service, stocking pastries, and preparing food and beverages on demand. Operated POS system accurately, handling cash and credit transactions.
shortDescription: Customer service and food preparation in fast-paced bakery environment.

title: IT Data Integration & Web Developer
description: Integrated a cloud-based database of 5000+ records with a dynamic webpage through API and Plugin utilization, enabling automated real-time updates. Independently created 8+ Python scripts tailored for non-technical colleagues streamlining the filtering and sorting of XML files with 400+ data points. Completed a comprehensive overhaul of web-page structure, integrating user feedback. Authored 20+ pages of detailed documentation.
shortDescription: Integrated cloud databases with web platforms and built Python automation scripts.

title: Kitchen Team
description: Collaborated with other staff members to cook several orders simultaneously. Operated large-scale cooking equipment such as noodle boiler and stovetops in a fast-paced kitchen environment.
shortDescription: Kitchen operations and food preparation in fast-paced restaurant.

title: Associate
description: Responded to customer inquiries using appropriate resources to deliver accurate information. Collaborated on special projects geared toward customizing support for emerging products. Tracked customer satisfaction levels and assisted in determining ways to improve customer service.
shortDescription: Customer service and special project collaboration in retail environment.

title: UI/UX Developer
description: Collaboratively developed a user-friendly weather application by using an API, enabling real-time data retrieval for accurate and up-to-date weather information. Designed and implemented a group scheduling application using Swift and SwiftUI, fostering efficient coordination by preventing scheduling conflicts.
shortDescription: Designed weather and scheduling apps using Swift and SwiftUI.

title: Summer Camp Counselor
description: Arranged recreational activities centered around Buddhism's Three Acts of Goodness by collaborating with fellow counselors. Supervised and remedied camper behavioral issues of over 200 campers by reporting concerns to camp leadership and communicating frequently with parents.
shortDescription: Led recreational activities and supervised 200+ campers.

title: Bachelor of Science
description: Graduated with a double major in Business Administration and Computer Science. Achieved Magna Cum Laude honors with a 3.75 GPA. Made Dean's List all semesters while balancing academics with leadership roles and internships.
shortDescription: BS in Business Administration and Computer Science with Magna Cum Laude honors.

title: High School Diploma
description: Graduated in the top 2% of class with AP Scholar with Distinction honors. Active member of National Honor Society, Student Council, and Track & Field team. Received academic scholarship and made Superintendent's List for four consecutive years.
shortDescription: Graduated top 2% of class with AP Scholar with Distinction honors.
